title: 6 new season tips to take from the street style set
text:
The street style set, aka the editors, buyers and influencers who populate the pavements outside runway shows, usually favour fashion over function. This season though, practical chic reigned. As a result, we've been able to pick up a plethora of trans-seasonal dressing tips over the course of the past month, from the new layering rules (double jumpers and triple prints) to making our summer outfits work for winter with one small swap.

Here are the new season tweaks that we're stealing from the street style set...

Knee-high boots with summer clothes
description: The street style set, aka the editors, buyers and influencers who populate the pavements outside runway shows, usually favour fashion over function.
